humor.friends_feedback: friends often say he's funny, though some like to take that away from him

gaming.note: was around computers from a really young age

professional_summary.headline: Experienced technical leader with 5+ years driving product innovation and engineering excellence
key_strengths: Scaling applications from concept to production
Transforming complex business requirements into user-centric solutions

work_experience.title: Tech Lead
key_achievements: Led development and optimization of key compliance products with end-to-end ownership
Served as primary technical contact for partners
Architected AWS-based infrastructure migrations (DynamoDB, Lambda, EC2)
Built full-stack features reducing churn by 24%
Mentored junior engineers on best practices and agile workflows
Collaborated with stakeholders on roadmap prioritization

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
key_achievements: Developed full-stack applications for OFCCP compliance
Owned end-to-end development of Local Outreach application
Designed Compliance-Post/Reporting Hub, reducing audit response times by 40%
Created Compliance CIW Workbook with Salesforce integrations

work_experience.title: Co-Founder & Software Engineer
key_achievements: Co-founded AI-powered platform achieving 1K+ users within 48 hours
Developed core features using Python and n8n workflows
Integrated machine learning models for automation
Owned product decisions including feature prioritization and UI/UX
Generated six-figure revenue across multiple brands

background_narrative.origin_story: Born in Baku, Azerbaijan and immigrated to the USA at age 9. Grew up in Stamford, Connecticut where he developed his passion for technology from an early age.
background_narrative.technical_journey: Was around computers from a really young age, which fostered a natural curiosity for building and problem-solving. This early exposure combined with gaming culture shaped his path into software engineering.
background_narrative.education_pivot: Despite studying Biology at Sacred Heart University, transitioned into tech, demonstrating adaptability and self-driven learning.
background_narrative.entrepreneurial_spirit: Co-founded an AI startup, showcasing ability to build products from scratch and take ownership of both technical and business decisions.
